characters: Driver of a black sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. The traffic is moderate with several vehicles ahead. A black sedan is seen on the right side, gradually moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane. A motorcyclist is also visible ahead, maintaining a steady speed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while navigating through moderate traffic. The driver is cautious of the black sedan on the right side, which appears to be moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black sedan, approximately 2 meters away, moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane. 2) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A black sedan is seen moving from the adjacent left lane into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while observing the black sedans movement. The vehicle is preparing to decelerate to avoid a collision due to the cut-in behavior of the black sedan.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black sedan, approximately 2 meters away, moving into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation.
